m_szDocSumamry: Senator Jim Webb Touts Small Nuclear Reactors Project Virginia Senator Leading the Charge in Congress for Expanded Nuclear Technologies  - By April Murelio - Senator Jim Webb (D-VA) has joined Virginia-based Babcock & Wilcox Nuclear Energy, Inc., (B&W NE) and Bechtel Power Corporation to announce a formal alliance to design, license and deploy a commercially viable Generation III++ small modular nuclear power plant.
